title: Do Reports actually work?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Do reports actually work? These cases appear every second game in 'high' elo. When i constantly report these people for going 1/7, 1/5, 1/4 does it actually go somewhere or am i wasting my time? Because it seems like a fucking joke at the moment.

replies.body:
It does work, and before you click me away, read this:
http://en.volu-eu.org/pbkb_general_user_view.php?art=7

Every single one of your reports lead to a investigation by the system. 

Int Feeding, homophobia and extreme toxicity lead to an instant 14 day or perma ban

these just take a while to be placed and oyu wont always get a notification about it

please keep in mind that feeding / playing bad is not a reason to punish someone. it has to be intentional

You may think that just because riot says that it works, means it does, but it really doesn't mean jack shit when there is proof that it doesn't work.

Feeding rarely gets banned (and when it does, it's 100's of games non-stop)

Trolling rarely gets banned.

The main thing that gets banned is one usage of any of the banned words.
They really should give out a lot more chat restrictions. Teach the players to be good, don't just fuck them in the ass and not give them a reach around.

Feeding takes a while to be punished (like 2 weeks or so) but it will be punished

im not too often on the OCE boards but on th EU and NA boards there are people to complain about their "unfair" bans every damn day

also i know 2 guys in person who got a 14 day suspension, thats all prove i can give you, you may as well try it out yourself

yes seems like it

and i may tell you, there are no "banned words" only some phrases (like kys etc)  and even then, the system is able to distinguish between some smack talk and real toxicity

The bans are only distributed to ppl who are seen as toxic by the community as the bot adapts to what ppl are reporting, for example if you report someone for saying "fuck" all the time in NA hes most likely not going to be banned, if you do this here you may get punished.

ofc it works the other way around too
whatever helps you sleep at night buddy.
riot doesnt rely ban people for being shit at the game but verbal abuse they do most of the time i always report people who r super toxic and most of the time they get a ban of sorts
Why is an EUW clown chiming in on OCE matters? Does he/she not realise that each server is moderated separately?
Because people are incompetent and constantly post on the wrong boards somehow.

You can't report someone for going 1/4, that's absurd.

If you report a lot for insignificant things, your reports have less weighting on actual action.

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/195405552/202160388

update, teemo jungle trolling, aatrox top feeding, dc midlaner. Where are my reports going? Do they work??

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/195401044/202160388

update, third game today, whereby a report was submitted following the intentional feeding of another 2 players in a soloq game. Where are my reports going?? DO they work??

Reporting for feeding never works.

Reporting someone for saying 1 bad word works.

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/195358872/202160388?tab=overview

went into another game straight after this post, 1-9 fiddle mid and a double jungle yorick, so....??? did my report have a meaningful repercussion?
